name: Indianhistoricalfacts
0:
”Alexa, open Indian facts”
”Alexa, begin Indian facts”
”Alexa, launch Indian facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: indian facts
des:
Are you looking for famous Indian personalities who share your birthday?
Are you looking for Indian historical facts/events on your birthday?
Are you struggling to remember which historical incident happened on a particular day?

If your answers to the above questions are 'yes', then this skill can help you out in finding the interesting facts/events that happened in Indian history on a particular day. This skill also enables users to know the birthdays of the famous Indian people. Just ask Alexa to say "Which historical event happened on this day or Which famous Indians have the birthday today". 

Features:
- Let's you to find an Indian historical event happened on a given day
- Enable you to find famous Indian personalities who have born on a given day.


If you have any suggestions or comment please let me know.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
